2,3,4,5,6,7,8:
If I can do anything to help,...
如果我能做任何可以帮到你的事情
非常陈恳强烈地表示自己的希望帮助对方的愿望

If I can do anything to help, just ask.
If I can do anything to help, please tell me.

1,2:
antique+n
古董XXX
[æn'tik]
注意重音

antique furniture
antique china

8:
Prague=布拉格广场, 捷克首都
[prɑ:ɡ]
10,11,12:
develop sth
发展出XXX

develop a scheme to attract younger customers.
develop a sense of humor(幽默感)
1,2,3:
Jim wants XXX to do
Jim想让XXX做某事

Jim wants them all to do as well as Anne's hotel.
Jim wants William to teach him rollerblade(Really?)
13,14,15:
just like sth
就像某人/某事
just表示强调, 就, 恰恰.

just like this hotel.
just like this guy

1,2,3:
And I hear
并且我听说

And I hear our C.T.O. is coming tomorrow.
And I hear our profit is up 7% this year.

1,2:
pretty+adj
pretty表示very

pretty good
pretty cheap
3,4,5:
It'll be to+spl.
将会是去某地

It'll be to China
It'll be to Central America.

5,6:
from there
来自那里

一般我们讲there/here是副词, 前边不加介词, 这里是例外
3,4:
lovely china
china是瓷器, 因为以前瓷器都来自中国, 所以外国人把瓷器就直接称为china, 注意不要大写首字母

lovely antique glass
lovely crystal

4,5,6,7,8:
go on+a trip/vocation/holiday

注意这里介词必须是on

Did you go on a city tour today?
1,2,3:
When are you doing
你何时做某事, 现在进行时表将来

When are you leaving?
When are you coming in for a meeting?

9,10:
come along
along表示沿着, 随着, 这里理解为随着我, 跟着我.

May I come along?(我可以一起去吗)
You can come along , if you like.
2,3,4,5,6,7,8:
It'll be much easier if you just do
如果你就直接做某事, 就容易的多了
用来表示建议, 你要不干脆直接做某事吧

It'll be much easier if I just show you.
It'll be much easier if you just come with us

1,2,3,4,5,6,7:
That is my favorite thing to do.
那是我最喜欢做的

-You like singing?
-That is my favorite thing to do

-You like speaking English?
-That is my favorite thing to do.

1,2:
I will
我会那么做的.

-Remember to drive on the right side of the street.
-I will.

-Remember to pick up a gift for Dean
-I will

7,8:
Central+国家名/洲名
表示某国/某洲中部

Central China
Central America
Central Asia
2,3,4:
I'm dying to do
我想做XX都快想死了, 我十分想做XX

I'm dying to meet our Chief Executive Officer.
I'm dying to go on a walking tour with Did.(Really?)

1,2,3,4:
please let me know
请让我知道

If you need anything, please let me know.
If I did anything wrong, please let me know.

4,5,6,7:
take sb/sth with you
带上某人/某事

Take me with you to central Asia.
Take this standard report with you so you can read it on plane.

9,10,11,12: 老城广场（Old Town Square）位于布拉格

2,3,4:
pick sth up
pick是拿起来, 拾起来的意思, 理解为我帮你拾起来一些, 就是我帮你挑选一些, 买一些.

I'll pick some books up for you.
I'll pick some lovely china for you.
7,8,9:
if you like
如果你喜欢的话

You can call me Wind, if you like.
I can tell you about our new marketing scheme, if you like.

1,2,3,4:
I'm looking forward to sth
注意这里to后边接名词或动名词.

I'm looking forward to our meeting.
I'm looking forward to meeting you again.

2,3:
serious+n
serious是严肃的意思, 理解为不跟你开玩笑, 正儿八经的很好的

Have some serious fun there.
That's some serious antique.

这个含义不好驾驭, 先做到理解它吧

1,2,3,4:
but it will be...
但是将会是

but it will be pretty high level
but it will be pretty soon
5,6,7:
so much+n
很多XX

so much anger
so much joy
